messages.messageBody:
Hi!
I'm mostly a lurker here but I just had to share a moment ...Trevor, age 5 in
September, was reading his Great Animal Search book (kinda like a Where's
Waldo? puzzle book) and I could hear him talking to himself. "I need to find
10 lemmings in this picture, but I only see 8. That means I need 2 more
lemmings to make 10." It was a great moment for me since I'm not a totally
confident unschooler yet and proved to me that unschooling works!
Amy



Amy Kagey
